story_20_03000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Guess that’s one victory for us!
I have to give you some credit, though—
you’re way stronger than I thought you’d be!
story_20_03000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Yeah! Our Pokémon all look like they had
a ton of fun in that battle!
story_20_03000/2401_1001_0300_10:
I told you I’m not a newbie when it comes to
Pokémon training...
story_20_03000/2401_1001_0400_10:
but you definitely impressed me back there.
I can see how you’ve made it this far in
the tournament.
story_20_03000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Well, Espurr... They’re definitely in the running
for the championship... We’ve got some decisions
to make.
story_20_03000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Well, it’s just... I actually have a couple reasons
for coming to find you today.
story_20_03000/2401_1001_0800_10: You’ve all heard of Team Break, right?
story_20_03000/2401_1001_0900_10:
How could we not? They’re trying to sabotage
the PML by stealing people’s Pokémon!
We’ve battled tons of them.
story_20_03000/2401_1001_1000_10:
I haven’t seen them around lately, though...
Not since the tournament matches began, I think.
story_20_03000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Well, it seems they’re back in business.
They’ve started stealing Pokémon again.
story_20_03000/2401_1001_1200_10:
I was planning to infiltrate one of their
hideouts, but Cynthia told me to hold off.
story_20_03000/2401_1001_1300_10:
That’s when she told me about you all...
She said you might be willing to help.
story_20_03000/2401_1001_1400_10: Aha... Well, how could we say no to that!
story_20_03000/2401_1001_1500_10:
But aren’t you supposed to be preparing for the
finals? Are you sure you want to get involved?
story_20_03000/2401_0401_1700_10:
No hesitation at all, huh? Cynthia was right...
You’ve definitely got some resolve.
story_20_03000/2401_0302_1800_10:
We can’t leave Team Break to
their own devices!
story_20_03000/2401_0402_1900_10:
That’s right! We’ve still got some time before
the opening ceremony begins. Let’s do this!
story_20_03000/2401_1001_2000_10:
We’d love to help you, Calem!
Let’s take down Team Break together!
story_20_03000/2401_1001_2100_10:
Thanks, everyone. Just do me a favor and
don’t go too overboard, OK? You’ve still got
a tournament to win.
story_20_03000/2401_1001_2200_10: Right, then. Let’s head to that hideout.
